bioText:
Hello, and welcome to my portfolio! I’m Drew Stock, and I’m currently a software development student at the Portland campus of Code Fellows.

I've developed this portfolio as one of my projects in the Code 301 course. I've enjoyed taking on the challenge of learning the concepts, languages and practices that drive front-end web development.

I'm excited to take the next steps in my career and begin utilizing my new skills as a professional developer! Please contact me if you'd like to learn more about my background and experience.
